outputs.output_descr: The pupose of the project is to provide secure land tenure arrangements for non-demarcated farms with the objective of creating legal farm boundaries and establishing secure tenure arrangements among farming communities with a purpose of contributing to the reduction of conflicts and disputes within farming communities and providing secure freehold title deeds which could enable farmers to acquire collateral to raise loans for intensive agriculture and/or other farm-based livelihoods ventures.

project_descr: The programme supports peace and state building in Somalia by strengthening local governance and improving the ability of district-level local authorities to reach out to their communities and deliver local development.
